name: Body Pump
description: A fast-paced, barbell-based workout to help you develop lean, athletic muscle by lifting light weights while performing high repetitions, instead of heavy weights but with fewer reps.

name: Spin
description: A high-intensity class combining cardio and endurance in a 45-minute calorie-crunching session! Not only is it great for giving you all the cardiovascular gains, but itâ€™s great at toning muscles to make you super strong.

name: Pilates
description: Pilates concentrates on strengthening the body with an emphasis on your posture, balance, and flexibility. This helps to improve general fitness alongside your overall wellbeing.

name: Yoga
description: Improve your strength, balance and flexibility, thanks to slow movements and deep breathing to increase blood flow and warm up muscles, while holding a pose can build strength.

name: HIIT
description: Take your cardio workout to another level with HIIT. Potentially the most time-efficient way to exercise, with short bursts of intense exercise alternated with low intensity recovery periods.

name: Box Fit
description: A high-intensity cardio workout based on boxing techniques using gloves and pad work. Suitable for all levels, this non-contact workout will you improve your agility, strength and overall fitness.

name: Step
description: Step aerobics is an up-tempo way to get your heart pumping and stay fit. Get  all the benefits of a high-intensity cardio workout without putting stress on your joints.

name: Zumba
description: Bring cardio and Latin-inspired dance together in this fun, high-energy workout experience that keeps you excited to exercise and return for more.

name: Body Tone
description: A top-to-toe workout aimed at toning and shaping the whole body. Exercises are designed to boost your metabolism and burn body fat.

name: Body Combat
description: Punch and kick your way towards your fitness goals with this high-energy martial arts-inspired workout. Great for burning fat, releasing stress and improving your co-ordination.

name: Body Balance
description: Body Balance concentrates on improving joint mobility and core strength, making you feel calmer and improving your sense of well-being, by combining Tai Chi, Pilates and Yoga.
